articles.title: Tata Neu will go beyond Tata Group at some point: N Chandrasekaran - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Tata Digital had last week launched its much-anticipated app Tata Neu, which houses several top Tata brands such as Tata Croma, AirAsia, and BigBasket.
articles.content: The newly-launched Tata Neu app, which houses major Tata Group brands from Tata Croma to BigBasket, will be open to brands outside of the group, executive Chairman N Chandrasekaran indicated while ad… [+2894 chars]

articles.title: Simu Liu commemorates 10th anniversary of getting fired from accountant job - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Marvel star even thanked the people at Deloitte Toronto for doing for him what he never had the courage to do for himself. “You destroyed a life that I was building for someone else, so that I could finally begin to build a life for me.”
articles.content:
Marvel star Simu Liu recently celebrated a very special anniversary. Ten years ago, on Apr 12, he was fired from Deloitte Toronto where he worked as an accountant.
While getting fired from a job can… [+2120 chars]

articles.author: Eustance Huang
articles.title: Asia-Pacific stocks rise as investors react to monetary tightening in South Korea, Singapore - CNBC
articles.description: The Bank of Korea announced Thursday a 25 basis points hike in its base rate to 1.5%, a decision predicted by less than half of the economists in a Reuters poll.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE Shares in Asia-Pacific were higher in Thursday trade, as investors watched for market reaction following monetary policy tightening announced in South Korea and Singapore.

articles.title: Jay Chou is coming to Singapore for a two-night concert in December - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Mandopop star is coming back to the Singapore National Stadium for another go at his Carnival World Tour on Dec 17 and 18. Ticketing details will be announced at a later date.
articles.content:
Jay Chou fans, mark your calendar for Dec 17 and 18 because the Mandopop King will be performing at the Singapore National Stadium at 8pm on those dates.
